name: N-hydroxy-L-isoleucine,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (N-hydroxylating)
definition: N-Hydroxy-L-isoleucine + Oxygen + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> N,N-Dihydroxy-L-isoleucine + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
comment: the second step of three-step reaction (see R09403, R10027+R10028+R10029)
